mapper.insert: insert into operator (ID, USERNAME, REALNAME, TELNO, WORKGROUP, PWD, LASTLOGIN, PRIVILEGE, COUNTY_MASK, DEFAULT_PERMIT, STATUS, DISTRICT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_CODE, COUNTY_NAME, EMAIL, ORG_ID, USER_ID, USER_ID1, MERCHANT_CODE, PLATFORM, TOKEN, LOGIN_FAIL_TIMES, FREEZE_TIME, LAST_LOGIN_PWD, create_time, delete_flag, update_time, USER_ROLE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyMask,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginFailTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freezeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userRole,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update operator set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REALNAME = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELNO = #{telno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORKGROUP = #{workgroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PWD = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTLOGIN = #{lastlogin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PRIVILEGE = #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY_MASK = #{countyMask,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_PERMIT = #{defaultPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY_CODE = #{countyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY_NAME = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_ID1 = #{userId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_CODE = #{merchantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATFORM = #{platform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOKEN = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_FAIL_TIMES = #{loginFailTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FREEZE_TIME = #{freezeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_LOGIN_PWD = #{lastLoginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, USER_ROLE = #{userRole,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
